article.title: Status and history for [tuk_cyrl]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: A few typos identified by Miikka-Markus Alhonen, who also located http://adamhukuklary.8m.net/cyr/index.htm
stage 4: Unicode version provided by Arthur Reutenauer.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
